an3.132:1.3: Pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo, pathavilekhūpamo puggalo, udakalekhūpamo puggalo.
an3.132:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an3.132:1.6: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an3.132:1.7: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pāsāṇe lekhā na khippaṁ lujjati vātena vā udakena vā, ciraṭṭhitikā hoti;
an3.132:1.8: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an3.132:1.9: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an3.132:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an3.132:2.3: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an3.132:2.4: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, pathaviyā lekhā khippaṁ lujjati vātena vā udakena vā, na ciraṭṭhitikā hoti;
an3.132:2.5: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an3.132:2.6: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an3.132:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo āgāḷhenapi vuccamāno pharusenapi vuccamāno amanāpenapi vuccamāno sandhiyatimeva saṁsandatimeva sammodatimeva.
an3.132:3.3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, udake lekhā khippaṁyeva paṭivigacchati, na ciraṭṭhitikā hoti;
an3.132:3.4: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo āgāḷhenapi vuccamāno pharusenapi vuccamāno amanāpenapi vuccamāno sandhiyatimeva saṁsandatimeva sammodatimeva.
an3.132:3.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
